articles.description: Sheffield United passed up the chance to return to the top of the Championship table as they were turned over 1-0 by derby rivals Rotherham United on their own patch.
articles.content:
United could not build on Saturdays 5-2 trouncing of leaders Burnley and could barely get going all evening, falling to defeat thanks to skipper Ben Wiles calm first-half finish.
